description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter widget for the dashboard screen of a kindergarten management system. It includes UI layout, state management, data fetching from providers, and user interactions.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main dashboard view of the application.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing data loading, UI updates, and user interactions for DashboardScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, triggering data refresh.

methods.name: _refreshData
methods.description: Asynchronously loads various data sets using providers.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard screen, including stats, quick actions, and recent activity sections.
